topic.fullpath: Topic :: Multimedia :: Graphics :: Capture :: Screen Capture

name: EVOR Capture
short_description:
A simple to use screenshot taker with an easy to use interface and preview window for quick view of your screenshot, if you are not happy with the size of the preview you can view the image in a seperate window or simply resize the main window


Current Version: 1.108

There have been many changes since the release of the original EVOR Capture shown in the tutorial video, here a few changes

-The program will now adapt its theme to the OS your are using.
-New support for Windows Aero
-New "Set window size" for The screenshot image viewer

Made for Windows, we reccomend using Windows 7 to take advantage of compatibility
